text: Mondli Khumalo (born 16 July 2001) is a South African cricketer. He made his Twenty20 debut for KwaZulu-Natal Inland in the 2018 Africa T20 Cup on 14 September 2018. In December 2019, he was named in South Africa's squad for the 2020 Under-19 Cricket World Cup. He made his List A debut on 7 March 2020, for KwaZulu-Natal Inland in the 2019–20 CSA Provincial One-Day Challenge. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:South African cricketers Category:KwaZulu-Natal Inland cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Mondli Khumalo
